tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_control_measures (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID NOT NULL,
    measure_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    measure_description TEXT,
    implied_regulations TEXT[],
    evaluation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    passed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_data (
    monitoring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    measure_id INT,
    standard_id INT,
    monitoring_date DATE,
    result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE QualityControlMeasures (
  control_measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  control_measure_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE MonitoringSystems (
  system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  monitoring_type VARCHAR(20),
  monitoring_frequency INT
)

CREATE TABLE Regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  regulation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceOfficers (
  officer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  officer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  officer_email VARCHAR(50),
  officer_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE AuditLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  log_description TEXT,
  performed_by VARCHAR(50)
)
